channel.title: Comments on: Third Strike, Wiseman
channel.description: Blogging demolitions one building at a time.

item.title: By: Dee Ann
item.dc:creator: Dee Ann
item.description: Love you for getting it! For encapsulating what I’ve experienced for five years with these monsters. Two words: THANK YOU!!
item.content:encoded:
Love you for getting it! For encapsulating what I’ve experienced for five years with these monsters. ❤️
Two words: THANK YOU!!

item.title: By: Elizabeth Fuller
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Fuller
item.description: They also knocked down the historic bungalow court at 412 N. Norton, and the adjacent Spanish-style apartment building at 428 N. Nortion, in 2017...over neighbors' vehement protests.
item.content:encoded: They also knocked down the historic bungalow court at 412 N. Norton, and the adjacent Spanish-style apartment building at 428 N. Nortion, in 2017…over neighbors’ vehement protests.
